text: Wolfenbüttel is a district in southeastern Lower Saxony, Germany. The Oker River enters the district in the south. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Samtgemeinden Samtgemeinden Samtgemeinden #Wolfenbüttel Free municipalities #Cremlingen #Schladen-Werla *1.
